body.p: To his excellency the Governor of Kentucky Thomas E Bramlette your petitioner Ben Young Jordan Young & Randal Young, State that at the February term of the Franklin circuit court held in 1863. They were fined forty dollars each amounting in the whole to one hundred and twenty dollars which fine incurred to the Commonwealth of Ky After deducting the per cent of the commonwealths Attorney and costs of suit. A malicious prosecution in the name of the Commonwealth had been set on foot by an individual by the name of Daniel Geo. who was and is an enemy of these defendant (Petitioners) alleging a trespass to real and personal property, and mainly by his evidence alone they were fined. They state that they are innocent. That they never committed any offense and that the whole thing was malicious, and unfounded from the beginning. They state that they are poor, and unable to pay that amount and if compelled to do so will be deprived of the means of support. They Therefore ask that your executive excellency clemency be extended towards them and that said fine be remitted so much as goes to the commonwealth. The Petitioners Ben Young Jordan Young and Randall Young state that the foregoing petition is true
